thread.title: Baahubali 2 pre-release event: SS Rajamouli builds huge Mahishmati Kingdom; here are 5 things to watch out for
thread.title_full: Baahubali 2 pre-release event: SS Rajamouli builds huge Mahishmati Kingdom; here are 5 things to watch out for

author: FE Online
title: Baahubali 2 pre-release event: SS Rajamouli builds huge Mahishmati Kingdom; here are 5 things to watch out for
text:
Entertainment Baahubali 2 pre-release event: SS Rajamouli builds huge Mahishmati Kingdom; here are 5 things to watch out for Baahubali 2 pre-release event: SS Rajamouli builds huge Mahishmati Kingdom; here are 5 things to watch out for As the function is all set to take place in Hyderabad today, several iconic stars from Tollywood industry are expected to grace the event. By: FE Online | Published: March 26, 2017 3:25 PM As the function is all set to take place in Hyderabad today, several iconic stars from Tollywood industry are expected to grace the event. (Source: IE) 
As the fans are eagerly waiting for the release of SS Rajamouli’s Baahubali 2: The Conclusion, the filmmakers were reportedly busy in building a huge set of Mahishmati Kingdom for the pre-release event of the movie. As the function is all set to take place in Hyderabad today, several iconic stars from Tollywood industry are expected to grace the event. Baahubali is no more a movie that belongs only to the southern film industry, but has now become the pride of Indian cinema that reflects the level of talent, intensity and wealth of Indian cinema to the world. 
Famous actor Nani will be hosting the entire event and the producer Shobu Yarlagadda has promised a bag full of surprises during the event. Though the guest-list and index of the event is still kept under cover, here are 5 things to watch out for during the pre-release event: 
i. Director Rajamouli took to micro-blogging site Twitter and informed the fans about live streaming of the event with VR technology offering a 360 degree view along with 4K video resolution to provide an experience of actually being at the venue. Even the camera along side the actors will give a ‘front row view’ of the show for online viewers. 
ii. For music lovers, the filmmakers have also planned to hold a grand audio launch section during the event scheduled at Ramoji Film City today. Music album of the film will hit stores next week. The Lahari Recording Company, which paid an amount of Rs 1.5 crore to secure the music rights of the first installment, has again bagged the audio rights of the upcoming part for a whopping price of Rs 4.5 crore. 
You might also want to see this: 
iii. Several south stars from Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, and Hindi film industry are expected to attend the function, which is reported to the ‘first-of-its-kind’ filmy event of the year. 
iv. According a report published by The Indian Express, Baahubali makers have invited superstar Rajinikanth as the special guest for the event and he is likely to grace the show. It is worth noting that earlier director Rajamouli had attended the Telugu audio release function of Rajinikanth’s Lingaa in Hyderabad. It is expected that the Thalaivar will now return the favour. 
v. The makers will also organise a premiere of Baahubali 2 in the UK as part of the UK-India Year of Culture events. The live streaming, the event will also be live telecast on TV channels like Maa TV, NTV and TV 9 from 6 PM onward. Please Wait while comments are loading... Trending Now
